QueryResult.text: ( SELECT o.ID AS ID, o.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, i.code AS OPPORTUNITY_ID, i.NAME AS OPPORTUNITY_NAME, c.ID AS COMPANY_INTERNAL_ID, c.COMPANY_NAME AS COMPANY_NAME, l1.ID AS TYPE_INTERNAL_ID, DECODE(l1.ID,0,NULL,l1.NAME) AS TYPE_NAME, l1.LANGUAGE_CODE AS TYPE_LANGUAGE_CODE, l2.ID AS STATUS_INTERNAL_ID, l2.NAME AS STATUS_NAME, l2.LANGUAGE_CODE AS STATUS_LANGUAGE_CODE, o.EXPECTED_CLOSE_DATE AS EXPECTED_CLOSE_DATE, o.revenue_currency_code, o.est_budget_currency_code FROM BIZ_OPP_GEN_PROPERTIES o, INV_INVESTMENTS i, SRM_COMPANIES c, CMN_LOOKUPS_V l1, CMN_LOOKUPS_V l2 WHERE o.PARENT_ID = i.ID AND o.COMPANY_ID = c.ID AND NVL(o.TYPE,0) = l1.ID AND o.STATUS = l2.ID )
